name: Rescue the dog
description:
A mystical adventure awaits you. The player has to play a girl who let the dog out on the street. A few hours later, the dog did not return home. It's time to go to find the dog and save her!
You can not even imagine what horror and fear will await you at every step! You have to enter a gloomy house filled with horrors and a terrible atmosphere. In the house you are waited by ghosts, both children, and adults. Skeletons, zombies guard this house from everyone. Black silhouettes with yellow eyes will give you paralysis of the body. Ghosts will want you to play with them and they will not like it if you refuse to play their games. House and witches will not let you calmly slip into the dark corner of the room. You need to be ready to fight monsters and ghosts. The creaks of the old abandoned house, crows and bats will give you a goose bump all over the house. Fear and horror in the house will reach you to the fingers and toes. We all love mysticism, so you have to play this amazing game. After you find the dog, you will need to escape from a terrible house.
Various puzzles, mini games will meet you at every step. For example, you have to collect whole objects, interesting puzzles, paint a bear, twist the gears and so on. Numerous locations of the mystical house with minimal lighting will strain your attention. After all, no one knows what will be waiting for you behind the wall of the next gloomy room. Laughter and crying ghosts will affect your psyche. Scattered children's toys, a wheelchair, dolls, balls, skeletons all this will give a unique taste of horror in the game.
Excellent graphics and gloomy musical accompaniment will plunge you headlong into this mystical game. I wish you enjoy this beautiful gothic work of art. If the game is liked by many players, then I will create the second part of this wonderful game.
